name: This plugin is Extremly Easy to Setup.  Simply upload Googlehourlytrends.php to your wordpress plugin Folder
author: Giftedwon

sections.description:
Once the File is uploaded install the plugin from your wordpress Admin Console. After you install the plugin goto Settings – > Google Current Trends
Then rom that Screen select the post title, and the category to have the post appear in each hour.
